title: I received a notice to upgrade...so I did.  Now all my bookmarks are gone
content: I received a notice to upgrade...so I did. Now all my bookmarks are gone. How can I get all my previously saved bookmarks back?
creator: tmaxxptm

title: Bookmarks lost after Firefox updated
content:
Firefox updated on Oct 13, 2020. On Oct 14, 2020 bookmarks are not displaying. Instead, there's an error message: XML Parsing Error: no root element found Location: chrome://browser/content/places/bookmarksSidebar.xhtml Line Number 1, Column 1:

Is this problem my computer or the Firefox update? And, more importantly, how do I get my bookmarks back??? Thanks!
creator: flyer70clw

title: what is the preference name ( in about:config) for firefox logins: import from file
content:
Firefox has been acting funny under Windows 10 lately so, I recently saved my bookmarks and logins to files (in anticipation that I may have to uninstall and reinstall firefox.) I read the article that explains that if "import from file" does not appear on the "logins & passwords" "more" menu (three dots) then, it means I have to go to about:config in the address bar and turn the feature back on. I went to about:config only to discover that I do not know the name of the preference that I want to toggle.

Does anyone know the name of that preference?
creator: angelos009
